captions.text:
Whip out your Grand Theft Auto lighter and
ignite an Assassin's Creed smoke grenade.

I'm Jake and this is episode #16 of Game LÜT.
Cut through that smoke with a Zer0's sword

replica from Borderlands 2 or just drive through
it with Batman's Tumbler that's made out of
parts from a Playstation 2.

Then throw on this awesome Hotline Miami Varsity
jacket, add some class with Team Fortress

2 patches, make sure your Los Santos Sheriff's
hat is properly tilted and cruise around on

a Vaultboy Longboard. Don't forget your Vault
Tec leather bracelet to go with it and to

get a better grip on the board, put on Evangelion
shoes.

Wear this Assassin's Creed 3 Flag like a cape
and skate over to a friend's to play Minecraft

chess with a really cool chess set you can
build yourself out of paper...

After your flawless victory, treat yourself
to these amazing Shadow of the Colossus posters
by James Gilleard...

Get ready for trick or treating with some
DIY costumes like a SIlent Hill Nurse, Big

Daddy, or get a group and go as a heist crew
from Grand Theft Auto 5.

If you go to a party afterwards, bring some
caped super hero shot glasses and put them

down on 3D printed Portal pressure button
coasters. As you peer across the room, look

for someone wearing a Super Mario dress and
some Starcraft pins. Then break the tetris

ice by asking, "Is that a Pokémon in your
pocket or are you just happy to see m-" oh...it
is a pokemon in your pocket...t-shirt.

Well maybe this Fortified heart necklace will
win you over. Allow me to set the mood by

lighting these Pokémon candles. You smell
great, are you wearing Bioshock Infinite inspired

perfume? Don't worry I have protection and
by that I mean a Dota 2 inflatable axe. I'm

not very good with it though, I did cut off
a leg...lamp. Well..two legs. But I just cover

them in Sonic socks so it's all good. Hey
yeah know what, lets just look at these awesome
Half Hero prints by Danny Haas...

I'm getting tired so I'm going to get into
my Iron Man Robe, wash up with Arc Reactor

soap, turn on my Thor Night Light, cuddle
a Kingdom Hearts Meow Wow plushie and dream

about this insane Skyrim Dragonborn Priest
Mask Statue...

Go to space with your very own Jebediah Kerman
figure, subscribe to Vsauce3 for more Game
LÜT, and look at this URL Link...tshirt.

Links (GET IT?!) to everything can be found
in the description below.

Also when I was at New York Comic Con I met
a Vsaucer named Jacob Jams. He makes these

cool hand made resin collectibles in his kitchen
to help raise money for autism. So check him

out, stay awesome, and as always, thanks for
watching.

title: Pikachu In Your Pocket! -- Game LÜT #16
